text: The food has always been good. There is nothing special about this place. It's a bar atmosphere with some tvs to watch some sports. But it beats almost every other option within that area. It's on par with Mr. Mikes across the street.
Food was good but experience was less than enjoyable. They would honor gift certificates. Too many convenient rules. I'm not going back.
3 stars because the food was decent. If your group wants to drink, go elsewhere.  High prices, tiny pours, plastic cups and a slow bartender. Ugh.
